properties.Summary: This module describes how you can use Intune to create and manage WIP policies that manage this protection. The module also covers implementing BitLocker and Encrypting File System.
properties.Title: Deploy device data protection
properties.Units: Introduction,Explore Windows Information Protection,Plan Windows Information Protection,Implement and use Windows Information Protection,Explore Encrypting File System in Windows client,Explore BitLocker,Knowledge check,Summary

content.value: This module describes how you can use Intune to create and manage WIP policies that manage this protection. The module also covers implementing BitLocker and Encrypting File System.
